memberdef.argsstring:
(".globl atkbd_isr 
""atkbd_isr: 
"" pusha 
"" push %ss 
"" push %ds 
"" push %es 
"" push %fs 
"" push %gs 
"" call keyboardHandler 
"" mov $0x20,%dx 
"" mov $0x20,%ax 
"" outb %al,%dx 
"" pop %gs 
"" pop %fs 
"" pop %es 
"" pop %ds 
"" pop %ss 
"" popa 
"" iret 
")
memberdef.name: asm
